languages.text: "Боль целого погибшего мира — тяжкое бремя, оно способно разбить сердце и надломить дух. Все ли готовы к встрече с ней?"
"The pain of an entirely dead world is a heavy burden, one that can break your heart and shatter your spirit. Are all of us ready to face it?"
languages.original_text: "Боль целого погибшего мира — тяжкое бремя, оно способно разбить сердце и надломить дух. Все ли готовы к встрече с ней?"

traits.locale_text: "The pain of an entirely dead world is a heavy burden, one that can break your heart and shatter your spirit. Are all of us ready to face it?"
traits.speaker: SororitasCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The pain of an entirely dead world is a heavy burden, one that can break your heart and shatter your spirit. Are all of us ready to face it?"
traits.speaker: SororitasCompanion

languages.text: “完全死寂的世界所蕴含的痛苦，会是个沉重的负担。这种负担会损害你的心灵，粉碎你的精神。我们所有人都准备好面对这种负担了吗？”
languages.original_text: "The pain of an entirely dead world is a heavy burden, one that can break your heart and shatter your spirit. Are all of us ready to face it?"

traits.locale_text: “完全死寂的世界所蕴含的痛苦，会是个沉重的负担。这种负担会损害你的心灵，粉碎你的精神。我们所有人都准备好面对这种负担了吗？”
traits.speaker: SororitasCompanion

languages.text: «El dolor de un mundo completamente muerto es una carga pesada, capaz de romper el corazón y doblegar el espíritu. ¿Estamos todos listos para afrontarlo?».
languages.original_text: "The pain of an entirely dead world is a heavy burden, one that can break your heart and shatter your spirit. Are all of us ready to face it?"

traits.locale_text: «El dolor de un mundo completamente muerto es una carga pesada, capaz de romper el corazón y doblegar el espíritu. ¿Estamos todos listos para afrontarlo?».
traits.speaker: SororitasCompanion

languages.text: 「完全なる死滅惑星の苦痛は重荷となる。それは心を傷つけ、精神を打ち砕くものだ。それに対峙する準備はできているか？」
languages.original_text: "The pain of an entirely dead world is a heavy burden, one that can break your heart and shatter your spirit. Are all of us ready to face it?"

traits.locale_text: 「完全なる死滅惑星の苦痛は重荷となる。それは心を傷つけ、精神を打ち砕くものだ。それに対峙する準備はできているか？」
traits.speaker: SororitasCompanion

languages.text: "Das Leid einer absolut toten Welt ist eine schwere Bürde, eine Bürde, die Euer Herz brechen und Euren Geist zerschmettern kann. Sind alle von uns bereit, sie zu tragen?"
languages.original_text: "The pain of an entirely dead world is a heavy burden, one that can break your heart and shatter your spirit. Are all of us ready to face it?"

traits.locale_text: "Das Leid einer absolut toten Welt ist eine schwere Bürde, eine Bürde, die Euer Herz brechen und Euren Geist zerschmettern kann. Sind alle von uns bereit, sie zu tragen?"
traits.speaker: SororitasCompanion

languages.text: « La souffrance d'un monde mort est un lourd fardeau qui peut briser aussi bien le cœur que l'esprit. Tout le monde n'est pas prêt à y faire face. »
languages.original_text: "The pain of an entirely dead world is a heavy burden, one that can break your heart and shatter your spirit. Are all of us ready to face it?"

traits.locale_text: « La souffrance d'un monde mort est un lourd fardeau qui peut briser aussi bien le cœur que l'esprit. Tout le monde n'est pas prêt à y faire face. »
traits.speaker: SororitasCompanion

languages.text: "Tamamen ölmüş bir dünyanın verdiği acıyı omuzlarında taşıması zordur, kalbini ve ruhunu paramparça edebilir. Biz hepimiz bununla yüzleşmeye hazır mıyız?"
languages.original_text: "The pain of an entirely dead world is a heavy burden, one that can break your heart and shatter your spirit. Are all of us ready to face it?"
